description: Turkey Planner answers two important questions for Thanksgiving - How many pounds of Turkey is needed for your party, and how many hours it will take to cook! It gives reply in a range, so depending on how hungry your party is, there are different sizes to choose. The cooking time also has temperature information along with whether the Turkey is fresh or thawed.
exampleInteractions: Alexa Ask Turkey Planner How many pounds of turkey is needed for fifteen people
Alexa Ask Turkey Planner What size of turkey is needed for ten people
Alexa Ask Turkey Planner How long does it take to cook a fourteen pound turkey
name: Turkey Planner
shortDescription: Ask how many pounds of turkey is needed for a certain number of people. Or ask how long it takes to cook a turkey.
